name: AMusicalChristmas
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a musical christmas
des: This story is a bout a young boy who hates listening to his sister's music so much, even when it's Christmas Eve. He finds some Presents of different Musical Instruments that his family gets, as well as his own present inside his Stocking. Alexa will ask you to fill in the blanks before she starts reading it to you.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
